definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: The country is ruled by a group of army officers.
sentences.chinese: 這位軍官今天上午派遣了一個團的兵力。

sentences.english: I will send more details to you once I see your references.
sentences.chinese: 我將派遣更多的細節，你一次我看見你的推薦。

sentences.english: The deputy of these travelers was despatched to take the news to the travel agency.
sentences.chinese: 這些旅遊者的代理人被派遣去送口信給旅行社。

sentences.english: The American carrier George Washington was slated to participate in the drill.
sentences.chinese: 美國的華盛頓號航母被派遣參與這次演習。

sentences.english: Singapore is also deploying an urban search and rescue team.
sentences.chinese: 新加波也派遣了城市搜救隊。

sentences.english: The officer detached a regiment this morning.
sentences.chinese: 這位軍官今天上午派遣了一個團的兵力。

sentences.english: China has sent her delegates to the conference.
sentences.chinese: 中國已派遣她的代表出席會議。

sentences.english: The Spanish Armada sailed to England in1588.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙無敵艦隊在一五八八年派遣到英格蘭。

sentences.english: The general detached a large force to surround the airport.
sentences.chinese: 將軍派遣一支大部隊去包圍機場。

sentences.english: China was among the first countries sending peace-keepers to Darfur.
sentences.chinese: 中國是首批向這一地區派遣維和部隊的國家之一。

sentences.english: China enhances law enforcement activities in relevant waters.
sentences.chinese: 中國派遣海監船加強在相關海域執法活動。

sentences.english: The airline said it was dispatching several officials to Guyana as well.
sentences.chinese: 航空公司表示，他們也派遣了一些人員前往圭亞那。

sentences.english: Then we sent our armed work teams to operate among the masses.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們派遣武工隊到羣衆中去進行活動。

sentences.english: Some 200 inspectors were dispatched across the nation for closer inspections.
sentences.chinese: 約200名稽查員被派遣至臺灣各地做更仔細的檢視。

sentences.english: Obtain banners from your sponsor Rotary club.
sentences.chinese: 向你的派遣扶輪社索取數面社旗。

sentences.english: Second, the deployment of military advisers always entails the risk of escalation.
sentences.chinese: 其次，派遣軍事顧問的人數總是有增加的趨勢。

definition: to go to war/to engage in war
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
to receive orders/to follow orders/to act under orders
to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
